partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: To offer you the best experience we teamed up with mayor players.

Deutsche Bahn.description: The Deutsche Bahn AG is Germans federal mobility and transport group. The trains from the DB address 5.400 train stations daily. However only 60% of them are fully accessible.
Deutsche Bahn.ourOffer: Our train connection algorithm uses only barrier-free train stations and allows for longer transfer durations, ensuring a more accessible and comfortable journey for everyone.

Tripadvisor.description: Tripadvisor is a rating platform for restaurants. In germany it in includes testimonials to over 1 mio Restaurants.
Tripadvisor.ourOffer: We personally verified the accessibility of the restaurants we included in our proposals to you. This way you can fully concentrate on that what matters: the moment.

personalized.subtitle: Personalised picks according to your preferences.
Personalised picks according to your preferences.

hotel.verificationInfo: All barrier-free features of our partners are thoroughly checked to ensure a swift and enjoyable stay for all of our customers.

overview.popularDestinationsSubtitle: Explore the top accessible hotels of the largest cities in Germany!

settings.notificationsLabel: Receive emails with special travel deals according to personal preferences

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone. Your user data and all of your reviews, comments, articleposts will be deleted.

results.verificationInfo: All users are have the opportunity to verify themselves on our platform, thereby enhancing and emphasizing the authenticity of article posts, ratings, and comments. Verified users can be identified by their distinct tags.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.text: You won't be able to revert this! This will permanently delete the articlepost and all of its comments.

algorithmBanner.title: Barrier-free connection algorithm
algorithmBanner.text: We've designed our train connection algorithm with our wheelchair users in mind! Our algorithm uses only barrier-free train stations and allows for longer transfer durations, ensuring a more accessible and comfortable journey for everyone

mszBanner.title: MSZ (Mobility Service Office)
mszBanner.text: Be aware, that you need to arrange for additional services provided by the MSZ of DB. Schedule via <mszLink>DB MSZ</mszLink> or simply call <mszPhoneNumber />.

results.headerNoSolution: We couldn't find accessible connections for you...
results.noResultsText: We couldn't find any barrier-free connections for your search. Please try again with different search parameters.
